trans-unit.source: Defines base methods for custom request validation.
trans-unit.target: Definerer base metoder for egendefinert forespørsel validering.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET does not validate requests until code explicitly requests a value from the request.
trans-unit.target: Som standard validerer ASP.NET ikke forespørsler til koden aktivt ber om en verdi fra forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: For example, ASP.NET does not validate query-string values until code accesses the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel ASP.NET validerer ikke spørringsstrengen verdier til koden har tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.QueryString%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET also does not validate some types of request data, such as form values, cookies, the names of files that have been uploaded using HTTP, and the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RawUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard ASP.NET også validerer ikke noen datatyper forespørselen, for eksempel skjemaverdier, informasjonskapsler, navnene på filer som har blitt lastet opp ved hjelp av HTTP- og verdien for den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RawUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.RawUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RequestValidator class is a base class that you can implement in order to provide custom request validation.
trans-unit.target: Klassen RequestValidator er en basisklasse som du kan implementere for å angi egendefinert forespørsel validering.

trans-unit.source: By implementing this class, you can determine when validation occurs and what type of request data to perform validation on.
trans-unit.target: Ved å implementere denne klassen, kan du bestemme når validering oppstår og hvilken type forespørselsdata til å utføre validering på.

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET provides cross-site scripting (XSS) checks.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir tvers skripting sjekker som standard.

trans-unit.source: However, you can supplement or replace the request validation logic that is provided in ASP.NET by creating a custom implementation of the XSS.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid tillegg eller erstatte forespørselen validering logikken som er angitt i ASP.NET ved å opprette en egendefinert implementering av Tillate.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can write a custom request validation implementation that scans for SQL injection attacks in addition to checking for XSS attacks.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel skrive en egendefinert forespørsel validering implementering som søker etter SQL-innsetting angrep i tillegg til søk etter Tillate angrep.

trans-unit.source: To create custom request validation, you write a custom class that derives from the RequestValidator base class.
trans-unit.target: For å opprette egendefinerte forespørselen validering, skrive en egendefinert klasse som er avledet fra RequestValidator basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: You then configure ASP.NET to use the custom request validator in the application-level Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Du konfigurerer ASP.NET til å bruke egendefinert forespørsel validerer i programnivå Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: You can put the custom class in the App_Code folder, in a compiled class library in the Bin folder, or in a compiled class library in the GAC.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sette egendefinerte klassen i mappen App_Code i en kompilert klassen biblioteket i mappen biters eller i en kompilert klassen biblioteket i GAC.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only one custom request validation type can be configured for an application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kan konfigureres bare én egendefinert validering av typen for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to configure a different request validation type for individual virtual paths or pages.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å konfigurere en annen validering av typen for individuelle virtuelle baner eller sider.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class has a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen har en standardkonstruktør.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: When a new instance of the class is initialized, an internal method retrieves custom validation details from the application's configuration information.
trans-unit.target: Når en ny forekomst av klassen er initialisert, henter en intern metode egendefinert validering informasjon fra programmets konfigurasjonsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: The configuration details are contained in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection> section.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonsdetaljene finnes i den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection>delen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestValidationType%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [httpRuntime elementet (ASP.NET innstillingsskjemaet)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) og <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestValidationType%2A>attributtet.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.RequestValidationType%2A>

trans-unit.source: During initialization, a single instance of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class is created, and a reference to the instance is maintained in the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering, en enkelt forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen er opprettet, og en referanse til forekomsten beholdes i den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.Current%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not create a new request validator instance per request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET opprette ikke en ny forespørsel validerer forekomst per forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, custom implementations of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class must be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Derfor egendefinerte implementeringer av den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen må være sikker.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the current <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"></xref> instance that will be used in an application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en referanse til gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"> </xref> -forekomst som skal brukes i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The Current property maintains a reference to the single allowed instance of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende egenskapen beholder en referanse til én tillatte forekomsten av <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: If no instance exists, a new one is created.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen forekomst, opprettes en ny.

trans-unit.source: If an instance already exists, the current instance is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes allerede en forekomst, returneres den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: During initialization, a single instance of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class is created, and a reference to the instance is made available in the Current property.
trans-unit.target: Under initialisering, en enkelt forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen er opprettet, og en referanse til forekomsten er gjort tilgjengelig i den gjeldende egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET does not create a new request validator instance per request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET opprette ikke en ny forespørsel validerer forekomst per forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, custom implementations of the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class must be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Derfor egendefinerte implementeringer av den <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen må være sikker.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Current property is not thread-safe while the property is setting a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den gjeldende egenskapen er ikke sikker når egenskapen settes en referanse til gjeldende <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Util.RequestValidator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a public method that calls the protected <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString*> method in order to validate HTTP request data.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en offentlig metode som kaller den beskyttede <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString*>metode for å validere data for HTTP-forespørselen.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString*>

trans-unit.source: The InvokeIsValidRequestString method provides public access to the protected <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InvokeIsValidRequestString gir offentlig tilgang til de beskyttede <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>

trans-unit.source: This lets you create a custom wrapper class for the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class and call the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> method without having to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du oppretter en egendefinert wrapperklasse for <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klassen og kall <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A>metoden uten å arve fra <xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>klasse.</xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator> </xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator.IsValidRequestString%2A> </xref:System.Web.Util.RequestValidator>

trans-unit.source: For information about request validation, see <xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>.
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om forespørselen validering under <xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>.</xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP context of the request.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-kontekst i forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request data to validate.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-forespørselsdata til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that represents the source of request data that is being validated.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting som representerer datakilden forespørselen som valideres.

trans-unit.source: The following are possible values for the enumeration: - <xref uid="langword_csharp_QueryString" name="QueryString" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Form " name="Form " href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cookies" name="Cookies" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Files" name="Files" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_PathInfo" name="PathInfo" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Headers" name="Headers" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Følgende er mulige verdier for opplistingen:-<xref uid="langword_csharp_QueryString" name="QueryString" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Form " name="Form " href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cookies" name="Cookies" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Files" name="Files" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_PathInfo" name="PathInfo" href=""></xref> - <xref uid="langword_csharp_Headers" name="Headers" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: (Optional) The key in the request collection of the item to validate.
trans-unit.target: (Valgfritt) Nøkkelen i request-samling for elementet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used if the data to validate is obtained from a collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes hvis dataene for å validere er hentet fra en samling.

trans-unit.source: If the data to validate is not from a collection, this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataene for å validere ikke er fra en samling, denne parameteren kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, indicates the zero-based starting point of the problematic or invalid text in the request collection.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, angir du nullbasert startpunktet for problematiske eller ugyldig tekst i request-samling.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the string to validate does not contain unencoded characters that could be used in a malicious scripting attack; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis strengen til å validere ikke inneholder unencoded tegn som kan brukes i en skadelig skripting angrep. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Validates a string that contains HTTP request data.
trans-unit.target: Validerer en streng som inneholder data for HTTP-forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: You implement this method to perform custom validation of request data.
trans-unit.target: Du Implementer denne metoden hvis du vil utføre egendefinert validering av forespørselsdata.

trans-unit.source: The base behavior of the IsValidRequestString method is like the behavior that ASP.NET implements internally to check for dangerous strings in cross-site scripting validation.
trans-unit.target: Basis-virkemåten for metoden IsValidRequestString er som virkemåte ASP.NET implementerer internt å se etter skadelige strenger i tvers skripting validering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hvordan: forhindre skripting i ASP.NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708).

trans-unit.source: If custom validation logic detects an error, this method should return `false` and provide a value in `validationFailureIndex` to indicate the starting point of the text that caused the error.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egendefinert validering logic finner en feil, denne metoden skal returnere `false` og angi en verdi i `validationFailureIndex` til å angi startpunktet for teksten som forårsaket feilen.

trans-unit.source: The value in `validationFailureIndex` must be 0 or a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i `validationFailureIndex` må være 0 eller et positivt heltall.

trans-unit.source: The logic in a request validation check proceeds as follows: - The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class performs a null-character removal check on the incoming data.
trans-unit.target: Logikken i en forespørsel om validering av gjennomføres slik: - <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>klassen utfører en null-tegn fjerning kontroll på innkommende dataene.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class calls either the IsValidRequestString method (the default implementation of the base method) or calls a derived version of the method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>Klasse kaller enten IsValidRequestString-metoden (standard implementering av metoden base) eller kaller avledede versjon av metoden.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: - If IsValidRequestString method returns `false` to indicate a validation failure, ASP.NET constructs an error string (if necessary) and throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis IsValidRequestString metoden returnerer `false` for å angi en valideringsfeil, ASP.NET bygger en streng for feil (om nødvendig) og oppstår en <xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequestValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The context of the current request.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten for gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request data to validate.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-forespørselsdata til å validere.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that represents the source of request data that is being validated.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting som representerer datakilden forespørselen som valideres.

trans-unit.source: The following are possible values for the enumeration: <xref uid="langword_csharp_QueryString" name="QueryString" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Form " name="Form " href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Cookies" name="Cookies" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Files" name="Files" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_RawUrl" name="RawUrl" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_PathInfo" name="PathInfo" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Headers" name="Headers" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Følgende er mulige verdier for opplistingen:<xref uid="langword_csharp_QueryString" name="QueryString" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Form " name="Form " href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Cookies" name="Cookies" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Files" name="Files" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_RawUrl" name="RawUrl" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Path" name="Path" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_PathInfo" name="PathInfo" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Headers" name="Headers" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The key in the request collection of the item to validate.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen i request-samling for elementet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used if the data to validate is obtained from a collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes hvis dataene for å validere er hentet fra en samling.

trans-unit.source: If the data to validate is not from a collection, `collectionKey` can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataene for å validere ikke er fra en samling `collectionKey` kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, indicates the zero-based starting point of the problematic or invalid text in the request collection.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, angir du nullbasert startpunktet for problematiske eller ugyldig tekst i request-samling.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren sendes ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the string to be validated is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis strengen godkjennes er ugyldig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
